00025 import java.util.Hashtable;
00026 
00027 public class VetManager

00030     //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00039     public void addVetClinic(String Name) throws IllegalArgumentException,
00040                                                  NullPointerException
00041     {
00042         if(Name == null)
00043             throw new NullPointerException("Vet Clinic nameis null");
00044         
00045 
00046         if( VetClinics.containsKey(Name) )
00047             throw new IllegalArgumentException("Vet clinic name already exists");
00048     
00049         VetClinic vet = new VetClinic(Name);
00050        
00051         VetClinics.put(Name, vet );
00052     }
00053     //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00062     public VetClinic getVetClinic(String Name)
00063     {
00064         if(Name == null)
00065             throw new NullPointerException("Vet Clinic nameis null");
00066         
00067 
00068         if( !VetClinics.containsKey(Name) )
00069             throw new IllegalArgumentException("Vet clinic '"+ Name +"' does not exist in the manager");
00070     
00071         
00072         return (VetClinic) VetClinics.get(Name);
00073 
00074     }
00075     //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00080     public String list_all_vet_clinics()
00081     {
00082         String ret ="";
00083         
00084         java.util.Enumeration e = VetClinics.elements();
00085         
00086         while(e.hasMoreElements())
00087             {
00088                 VetClinic vet = (VetClinic) e.nextElement();
00089                 ret += vet.getName() + "\n";
00090             }
00091 
00092         return ret;
00093     }
00094     //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00099     public String list_all_animals()
00100     {
00101         String ret ="";
00102 
00103         java.util.Enumeration e = VetClinics.elements();
00104 
00105         while(e.hasMoreElements())
00106             {
00107                 VetClinic vet = (VetClinic) e.nextElement();
00108 
00109                 ret += "============================================================\n";
00110                 ret += "VetClinic: " + vet.getName() + "\n";
00111                 ret += vet.listAll_animals();
00112                 
00113             }
00114 
00115         return ret;
00116     }

00119     private Hashtable VetClinics = new Hashtable();
